name: Mizeria
description:
Find A Way Out


A renowned archer Nuoli, embarks on a journey to escape from a mysterious castle.

Mizeria is a short game where you need to climb a giant tower with the help of your bow and a friendly spirit.

Game Features


-Simple game where you just have to climb out of a tower.

-Fun little bow, that can aid your climbing journey.

- Retro late 90's graphics. All the graphics from the early 5th gen era, with modern controls for smooth yet atmospheric gameplay.
